sections.title: Practical Learning for Real Decisions
sections.subhead: Learning at Cupcakes + Broccoli is designed to be used.
body: The resources here are built to help Black founders make decisions, move work forward, and build with confidence.
This is practical guidance, grounded in real experience.

sections.title: Tools, Frameworks, and Stories
body: The Learn section brings together tools, frameworks, and stories shaped by real founder work.
list: Decision frameworks for pricing, positioning, and focus
Step-by-step guides for launching, restructuring, and scaling
Templates for proposals, scopes of work, and strategy documents
Case studies drawn from real situations
Essays and reflections that provide context and perspective

sections.title: Start With a Question
body: Some founders come here with a specific question.
Others come when something feels stuck.
You can browse by topic or use the AI concierge to get oriented before going deeper.

inlineLink.label: Ask a question using the AI concierge

sections.title: Built for Public Access and Deeper Membership
body: A portion of the Learn library is available publicly.
Deeper tools and expanded frameworks are available through Membership, which helps keep the work thoughtful and well-supported.

image.alt: Portrait layered over a patterned textile background.

sections.title: Connected to the Work
body: Learning at Cupcakes + Broccoli does not happen in isolation.
Many resources connect to consulting work, member conversations, Blind Dinners, and shared stories from the community. The goal is not consumption. It is application.

inlineLink.label: See how learning connects to real experiences

sections.title: Start Learning
body: If you are looking for shortcuts, this may not be the right place.
If you are looking for practical guidance grounded in experience and care, you are welcome here.
